type.description:
## XP Points

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/xp_points)

Checks the experience points of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:xp_points`



---

### ðŸ“ Note

__This entity condition type will only work on players.__






---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:xp_points",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 90
}
```

This example will check if the player has 90 or more experience points, which is only achieveable if the player have at least 7 levels.
